channel.title: Downtime on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Downtime on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: At Least 750 US Hospitals Faced Disruptions During Last Year’s CrowdStrike Outage, Study Finds
item.description: Of those, more than 200 appear to have had outages of services related to patient care following CrowdStrike’s disastrous crash, researchers have revealed.
